response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special price of $9,500. I am confident that this offer provides a fair balance between value and cost, ensuring that both parties benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
